price: Shkoni ti dhe vëllai yt me mrekullitë e Mia dhe mos reshtni së përmenduri Mua!
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
